snippet: Tommy Iommi's cancer was caught early, and he and is doctors are working on developing a treatment plan.
abstract: Tommy Iommi's cancer was caught early, and he and is doctors are working on developing a treatment plan.
lead_paragraph: Tony Iommi, the lead guitarist for Black Sabbath, has lymphoma and will undergo treatment in London, according to a statement posted on his Web siteon Monday.

headline.main: Black Sabbath Guitarist to Undergo Treatment for Lymphoma
